nodes.text: Umgullian blob gelatin was a lunch side at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant prior to the eatery's destruction during the first two years of the Galactic Empire's reign. The gelatinous dish was sold for 4.5 credits. It shared its name with the Umgullian blob, a species native to the planet Umgul.
Umgullian blob gelatin was introduced in "Dining at Dex's," a 2009 Hyperspace-exclusive article which was written by Gregory Walker and formatted as an in-universe menu.
